name: Sand Flame: Vengeance
blurb: The War on Terror is about to find its way to your mobile device. Be a part of this new kind of mobile game!

rewards.reward: Thank you for your contribution!  We will send you several of our original "Sand Flame: Vengeance" desktop wallpapers!
You will receive one downloadable copy of "Sand Flame: Vengeance" as soon as it comes out!
Digital Download Package.  You will receive one downloadable copy of "Sand Flame: Vengeance",  the original game soundtrack, and a digital copy of the game concept artwork!

You will be one out of the sixty people who get a special beta code to test our multiplayer stage in early stage of development period, you will receive email invite through test flight. You will also receive special thanks credit at the end of the game.
You will be given access to a special backers-only weapon(HandGun) for in-game use in Sand Flame: Vengeance and one downloadable copy of the game.
You will be given access to backers-only weapon(Knife) for in-game use in Sand Flame : Vengeance and one downloadable copy of the game.
Include rewards from previous tiers, exclude the limited offers. You will be given code to unlock another character for multiplayer.

You will be given a special thanks t-shirt from us with original art of the main character on the t-shirt itself, signed by our lead developer. Include all rewards from previous tiers, exclude limited offers from previous tiers.

In the "Special Thanks" section of the "Sand Flame: Vengeance" game credits, we will add a special animation to your name to make you feel special.  Because you are. Also include rewards from previous tiers, excluding the limited offers tiers.

You will receive an in game camouflage for online gameplay, the set of camouflage will only be available for the backers. You will also receive signed copy of the original art from our developers, too.

Sneak Preview Package. We will send you beta versions of the levels in Sand Flame: Vengeance BEFORE the game is released! We will even allow you to provide comments to our designers to incorporate into the game to make it EVEN BETTER! Also includes rewards from previous tiers, excluding the limited offers tiers.

You will receive special, framed concept art (around 36\u2033x24\u2033) that will be released only to the 20 backers, signed by our head concept artist. You will also receive all rewards from previous tiers, excluding the limited offers.

We will send you personalized e-mail updates about game development progress from now until the release of Sand Flame: Vengeance, complete with screenshots, demos, and video clips of gameplay. You will be one of the few to get in on all the inside scoop! You can ask questions (we will even answer them!) and offer suggestions for things you would like to see in the game. Also includes rewards from previous tiers, excluding the limited offers.

Pick an item, any item(relative to game).  We will animate it in 3D and hide it somewhere in one of the levels of "Sand Flame: Vengeance"!  We will even tell you where it is just in case you cannot find it on your own.

Associate Producer Package.  You will aid our team in designing a special bonus level for "Sand Flame: Vengeance" via Skype and/or email.  You tell us what to incorporate into the level, and we will do it!  Your wish is our command!  You will also be credited with the title "Associate Producer" in the game credits.  You will also get an extra character to be made in game, we would pick where it appears in game as supporting role.

Producer Package.  We will fly you to Nanjing and put you up in a hotel for a couple of nights.  You will come to our studio and participate in the on-site game creation process, possibly including (but not limited to) character voice recording and motion capture animation. We may even take you out for a couple of genuine, delicious Chinese dinners (if we like you, JK).  You will also be credited with the title "Producer" in the "Sand Flame: Vengeance" game credits. You are responsible for passport and visa requirements to travel to China. We will make a character for you in game that would appear in side missions, you get to pick where to appear when you are at our studio.
